name: Waltzing Matilda Sunset Cruise
description: Set sail from Airlie Beach on the Waltzing Matilda, a sunset tour that promises a serene escape. This cruise offers a front-row seat to nature’s masterpiece, as you embark on a sunset voyage through the enchanting Whitsundays Islands. Ideal for solo travelers, groups, couples, families, and friends, this experience combines relaxation with breathtaking views. Enjoy the spacious and comfortable deck area, with a complimentary glass of bubbles and nibbles as you take in the panoramic views of the Whitsundays and Airlie Beach.
includes:
One complimentary glass of bubbles
Spacious and comfortable deck area
All inclusive (nothing extra to pay)
Panoramic views of the Whitsundays and Airlie Beach
highlights:
Sail through Pioneer Bay
Marvel at the breathtaking sunset over the ocean
Relax with a drink and nibbles
Suitable for solo travelers, groups, couples, families, and friends
A camera to capture the incredible sunset
Sunglasses for when you set off
Rain jacket (if needed)
ideal_for: Solo travelers, groups, couples, families, and friends

name: Whitsunday Pearl 3D/3N
description: Experience the ultimate escape aboard Whitsunday Pearl, a stylish and fully crewed catamaran that offers an intimate sailing adventure for up to 8 guests. Ideal for those seeking privacy and relaxation, this tour takes you to the most scenic and secluded locations in the Whitsundays. Enjoy the comfort of spacious decks and private ensuite cabins, perfect for unwinding as you sail through the crystal-clear waters. This journey is perfect for couples, families, and small groups who want to explore the Great Barrier Reef and Whitehaven Beach in luxury and style.
departure_times: Departure and return times not specified
includes:
Fully crewed with a skipper and hostess
Snorkelling equipment including mask, snorkel, wetsuit, and floatation devices
All marine park fees
Visit to Whitehaven Beach & Hill Inlet
Great Barrier Reef snorkelling
Stand-up paddle boards
Solar panels to power onboard appliances
Wifi onboard powered by Starlink
Charcoal filtered drinking water
Onboard ice maker and coffee machine
BYO alcohol and drinks
highlights:
Intimate group sailing with only 8 guests
Lagoon 450 vessel, 14 meters in length and 8 meters in width
Four stylish double cabins with private ensuites
Spacious decks perfect for relaxing
Experienced skipper and host
Visit the least crowded beaches and proven quiet calm safe anchorages
ideal_for: Couples, families, and small groups looking for a private and luxurious sailing experience in the Whitsundays.

name: Summer Jo 3D/3N
description:
Experience the Whitsundays in style aboard Summer Jo, a luxurious mega yacht offering intimate small-group adventures. Fresh from a remarkable $1 million makeover, this spacious vessel comfortably accommodates 32 passengers, providing a perfect home away from home. Ideal for solo adventure-seekers, friend groups, or families with older children, Summer Jo promises a unique blend of comfort and adventure.
Dive enthusiasts will rejoice with the opportunity for scuba diving, including a free scuba experience to explore the mesmerising depths of the Great Barrier Reef. Enjoy the southern allure of world-renowned Whitehaven Beach and the pristine oasis of Blue Pearl Bay. Culinary adventures await with mouthwatering meals prepared by our onboard chef, and the spacious decks offer plenty of room for socialising and unwinding under the sun or stars.
includes:
All meals (unless you require gluten-free, vegan or dairy-free meals)
Snorkelling equipment, including masks and snorkels
Dedicated Dive Master onboard
Unlimited hot showers
BYO Vessel – no glass, no red wine
highlights:
Luxurious mega yacht with a $1 million makeover
Accommodates 32 passengers in private, air-conditioned cabins
Scuba diving with a free scuba experience
Explore the Great Barrier Reef and Whitehaven Beach
Mouthwatering meals prepared by an onboard chef
Spacious decks for socialising
Journey to the Outer Great Barrier Reef
Locally owned vessel
price_tiers: Share Single Ensuite: A$826.26 | Share Double Ensuite: A$1,598 (for 2 people) | Private Double Cabin Ensuite: A$1,879.06 (for 2 people) | Private Twin Cabin Ensuite: A$1,879.06 (for 2 people) | Private Queen Cabin Ensuite: A$2,115 (for 2 people)
ideal_for: Solo adventure-seekers, friend groups, families with older children

name: Solway Lass 3D/2N
description: Step aboard the beautifully preserved tall ship, Solway Lass, for a leisurely sailing adventure around the Whitsunday Islands. Ideal for backpackers and adventure seekers, this 3-day journey offers a unique blend of history, comfort, and excitement. With expansive deck space, a licensed bar, and air-conditioned cabins, guests can relax and enjoy the stunning surroundings. Engage in activities like a fun rope swing, stand-up paddleboarding, and helping to set the sails. Experience the breathtaking beauty of the Whitsundays, including the iconic Whitehaven Beach, and create life-long memories under the stars.
includes:
All meals and snacks
Tap water, tea, and coffee
Bath towel
Standup paddleboards
Snorkelling equipment and basic tuition
Stinger suit
All marina levies
Services of skipper and crew
highlights:
Sail on a beautifully preserved tall ship
Expansive deck space and licensed bar
Air-conditioned cabins for comfort
Fun rope swing and stand-up paddleboards
Visit iconic Whitehaven Beach
Engage in setting sails and taking the helm
Stunning sunsets and stargazing opportunities
Communal meals served alfresco on deck
locations: Airlie Beach,Great Barrier Reef,Hook Island,Whitehaven,Whitsunday Island
itinerary:
**Day 1:**
- Arrive at Whitehaven Beach South for beach activities or relaxation
- Anchorage at Whitehaven Beach for sunset
**Day 2:**
- Breakfast with Whitehaven Beach as backdrop
- Paddleboarding, beach games, or walk to Whitehaven Beach South lookout
- Lunch onboard and sail to Hook Island
- Afternoon snorkel and enjoy sunset
**Day 3:**
- Set sails for the final time across Whitsunday Passage
- Arrive back at Airlie Beach

ideal_for: Backpackers and adventure seekers looking for a unique sailing experience in the Whitsundays.

name: Siska 2D/1N
description: Experience a youthful and social sailing adventure in the Whitsundays aboard Siska, a classic sailing yacht. With its roomy interior and open-plan accommodation, this tour is perfect for making new friends while exploring iconic locations. Enjoy breathtaking sunsets, guided bushwalks, and snorkeling over vibrant coral reefs. Ideal for those with limited time seeking fun and camaraderie in a stunning natural setting.

All meals and snacks

Snorkeling equipment and basic tuition
Stinger suit
All bed linen
highlights:
Sail on a classic yacht with a roomy, open-plan interior
Guided bushwalk to Hill Inlet Lookout
Explore Whitehaven Beach and its unique silica sand
Sunset drinks and pre-dinner snacks
Snorkeling over fringing coral reefs
Communal meals with fresh, locally sourced ingredients

name: Prima Sailing Adventure
description: Embark on a memorable sailing adventure aboard Prima, a charming vessel designed for intimate small-group experiences around the Whitsundays. Enjoy the relaxed atmosphere and personalized service as you sail through idyllic island locations. Perfect for families, couples, and small groups seeking a blend of soft adventure and relaxation. Whether sunbathing on the cushioned deck or exploring vibrant marine life, each journey offers something unique and unforgettable.

name: Whitsunday Getaway 2D/2N
description: Enjoy the comfort and privacy of a stylish catamaran on the Whitsunday Getaway, perfect for couples seeking a romantic escape or small groups looking for an intimate sailing experience. Fully crewed with a skipper and hostess, this tour offers a relaxed world of sailing, taking you to the most scenic locations, least crowded beaches, and quiet, safe anchorages. Guests can engage in sailing or simply relax and enjoy the luxury of the boat, making this an ideal getaway for both beginners and seasoned sailors.
departure_times: Arrive at Coral Sea Marina South – Meeting Point ‘C’ 2:30 pm
includes:
Fully crewed with a skipper and hostess
Gourmet meals prepared onboard
Guided bush walk to Hill Inlet lookout
Snorkeling equipment
Stand-up paddleboarding
Continental breakfast and buffet lunch
Pre-dinner drinks
highlights:
Sail through surreal island scenery
Visit Whitehaven Beach with pure silica sand
Guided bush walk to Hill Inlet lookout
Snorkeling in vibrant underwater world
Relax on spacious deck and outdoor lounge
Opportunity to try your hand at sailing
price_tiers: Private Double Cabin Ensuite: A$1405.30 (for 2 people)
locations: Airlie Beach,Great Barrier Reef,Hill Inlet,Whitehaven,Whitsunday Island
itinerary:
**Day 1:**
Arrive at Coral Sea Marina South and meet your skipper and hostess. Begin sailing through island scenery and drop anchor in a protected bay. Enjoy pre-dinner drinks and a gourmet meal prepared by your hostess.
**Day 2:**
Wake up to a continental breakfast and sail to Whitehaven Beach. Enjoy the beach and a guided bush walk to Hill Inlet lookout. After a buffet lunch, snorkel in the northern Whitsunday Islands. Spend the night at another anchorage.
**Day 3:**
Enjoy a final breakfast onboard and a last snorkel or paddleboarding session. Sail back to Airlie Beach, taking in the island archipelago's beauty. Return to Coral Sea Marina South.
menu:
**Day 1 Menu:**
- Gourmet dinner prepared onboard
**Day 2 Menu:**
- Continental breakfast
- Superb buffet lunch
**Day 3 Menu:**
- Final breakfast onboard
ideal_for: Couples, small groups, and those seeking a romantic or intimate sailing experience.

name: Summer Jo 2D/2N
description: Experience the Whitsundays aboard the luxurious mega yacht, Summer Jo, perfect for couples, families, and small groups seeking adventure and relaxation. This newly refitted yacht offers top-notch amenities for ultimate comfort, creating a social and action-packed journey. Explore vibrant coral reefs and the world-famous Whitehaven Beach, offering unforgettable snorkeling and diving experiences. Ideal for those looking to connect with nature and fellow travelers while enjoying gourmet meals prepared onboard.
departure_times: Departs Mondays and Wednesdays at 4 pm, Returns Wednesdays and Fridays at 2 pm
includes:
Luxury accommodations aboard the Summer Jo
All meals and snacks
Snorkeling and diving equipment
Opportunities to complete Advanced Dive Course
Visits to Whitehaven Beach and other Whitsunday locations
highlights:
Explore the breathtaking Whitsundays
Snorkel and dive in vibrant coral reefs
Visit world-famous Whitehaven Beach
Social and action-packed journey
Luxury mega yacht with top-notch amenities
Opportunities to enhance dive skills onboard

itinerary:
**Day 1:**
- 4 PM: Set off from the Port of Airlie and cruise toward Tongue Bay. Get to know your fellow travellers while soaking in the stunning scenery and your first unforgettable Whitsunday sunset.
**Day 2:**
- Begin your day with a beautiful sunrise, a hot cup of coffee, and a delicious breakfast. Spend your final morning exploring your last snorkel and dive spots before we head back into port, ending your unforgettable Whitsundays journey.

name: Waltzing Matilda: 2 Day 1 Night Whitsundays Cruise
description: Join us aboard Waltzing Matilda for an unforgettable sailing adventure, where the beauty of the Whitsundays is matched only by the warmth and comfort of your experience. Waltzing Matilda offers exclusive small group sailing adventures for an intimate and personalised experience. Ideally suited to chartering through these azure waters, Waltzing Matilda boasts comfort and style, ensuring every moment aboard is nothing short of magical. Settle into our cosy, well-appointed spaces where every detail is taken care of with love. The vessel’s layout is thoughtfully designed to foster community and connection among guests, making each journey a unique experience. From secluded beaches to vibrant coral reefs, the Whitsundays are a treasure trove of natural wonders waiting to be explored.
includes:
Very knowledgeable, helpful and friendly crew
Wide flat decks with shade awnings
Meals prepared onboard using fresh local produce
Snorkelling equipment and tuition provided
All marine & park fees included
highlights:
Exclusive small group sailing adventures
Intimate and personalised experience
Comfort and style aboard Waltzing Matilda
Cosy, well-appointed spaces
Community and connection among guests
Secluded beaches
Vibrant coral reefs
Treasure trove of natural wonders
